title: He~nshin!!: Sonata Birdie Rush
original_name: へ～ん・しん!! そなたバーディ・ラッシュ
sinopse: Hayama Sonata has been a pro golfer for two years, but not many know who she is because she lost in the preliminaries of her last tournament. She unfortunately hasn't had a sponsor because of that so now she can't play in any tournaments because of the debt her parents left her.
